section.title: Audience
section.para: This guide is specifically intended for service developers using JBoss Transactions. It is also contains useful information about how transactional applications work in general.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.para: To understand this guide, you need a basic familiarity with Java service development and object-oriented programming.

listitem.para: A general understanding of the APIs, components, and objects that are present in Java applications.
A general understanding of Linux, UNIX, or Microsoft Windows server.
